neighborhood_overview:
You can visit a different beach every day as this coast has a choice of beautiful coves and beaches. Â In addition to the magnificent Platja Gran de Pals, nearby you will find Platja del RacÃ³, Sa Riera, Sa Tuna, Aiguafreda, Aiguablava and many more.

The fascinating old town of Begur with its ancient castle is only 5 minutes away by car and Palafrugell is just 10 minutes drive. Â Both offer you many shopping and sightseeing opportunities as well as restaurants and bars.

This is also an area that actively encourages exploration of nature. Â In particular the carefully constructed and maintained walkways enable you to access dream landscapes, inaccessible coves and splendid beaches backed by the pines, dunes and the natural vegetation of the area, not forgetting the fascinating Illes de Medes just offshore.

To enjoy of a shopping dayÂ  visit Begur to only 5 minutes in car or Palafrugell (10 minutes in car). There he will find everything what you need.

host_about:
Sleep and Stay is a professional holiday rental agency and licensed Real estate Agency.
All our properties are carefully selected and we prioritize customer service, a personal touch and impecable cleaning. We leave a welcome package with cleaning products (dishwasher tablets, laundry tablets, sponge, cloth and extra garbage bags) and first essentials like coffee, tea, sugar, salt, pepper, olive oil and vinegar. Those items you just need for a couple of days away, are just great to have at your disposal. 
Most people that visit Girona once, never want to leave again. They want to come back, because Girona has it all. We recently opened a branch in Besalu which is small medieval copy of Girona. We have beaches, culture of Dali, the great Spanish kitchen with lotâs of different tapas and wines, old medieval villages and mountains great for skiing, hiking and cycling! What else do you want?

Thatâs why we fell in love with Girona and made it our business of helping people to find their dream holiday home for a weekâs stay or even to buy a property and have a second home in this amazing region! Sleep & Stay is owned by Jolien Huizing Gerrans, Dutch nationality, and she has surrounded herself by an amazing team. Sonia (Polish) and Luis (Honduras). We personally manage each holiday property that are featured on this website and are experts in the Girona property market for more than 4 years. We all speak next to our mother tongues Spanish, Catalan and English which makes all language barriers disappear!

As a young and dynamic holiday rental organisation, specialised in amazing holiday rentals, property management and property finder services. We can assist you in finding a special place to stay in Girona. We value quality, comfort and well maintained holiday rentals as our most important goals. We want to find that charming place for you that makes you fall in love with Girona too and makes you want to stay forever.

Once you arrive and you need anything, we are here to help you. Available on (Hidden by Airbnb) , email and we're just a phone call away. Welcome to come and stay with us!

host_about:
I was born in Barcelona the year the Beatles released their 7 album Revolver... I'm a graphic designer although I wanted to be a photographer and I would have liked to design boats. I sail in Laser, a small and individual boat with which it is very fun to compete although my heart is still in love with windsurfing.
When I travel, I like to walk, eat and feel the place, if I can take advantage to enrich myself with what the site offers: culture, sport or just enjoy the scenery.
Barcelona has almost everything, from sea to mountain, that is why people like to live in this city ... Each neighborhood is a world and often those of us who live in the city are surprised to travel through neighborhoods where we do not reside.

name: Bonaire Hotel - Double room, L'Escala
description:
Located in the village of L'Escala, just 20 metres from the beach, the Hotel Bonaire is an establishment whose management was passed from parents to children until three years ago, which was transferred to other managers but now it is back to the Hotel Bonaire of before. A family hotel, managed by the same people who founded it. In its facilities it is possible to rest in an atmosphere where the family treatment and a great tranquility stand out.

The space
It is a centrally located hotel, which distributes its spaces in a classic and well-preserved construction, decorated with good taste and functionality. The hotel has an elevator and Wi-Fi.

The Hotel has 12 rooms decorated in a very cosy style. It has single, double, triple and quadruple alternatives, and all of them have a terrace, sea views and lateral views of the sea. They come equipped with a complete bathroom with hairdryer, television with access to cable channels, safe, air conditioning (hot
neighborhood_overview:
L'Estartit beach is a nice place. There is a wide sandy beach that ends slowly. And plenty of parking. (free) The Medes Islands are very popular with divers and for snorkelling. There is a sea of excursions every day, it is also nice to go paddle surfing, windsurfing or canoeing there. But a boat trip to the islands is also worth a visit.
There is a pleasant shopping street, boulevard and many terraces, restaurants and bars. Torroella de MontgrÃ­ is a typical Catalan town with streets and small shops, terraces and a nice weekly market.

host_about:
Sleep and Stay is a professional holiday rental agency and licensed Real estate Agency.
All our properties are carefully selected and we prioritize customer service, a personal touch and impecable cleaning. We leave a welcome package with cleaning products (dishwasher tablets, laundry tablets, sponge, cloth and extra garbage bags) and first essentials like coffee, tea, sugar, salt, pepper, olive oil and vinegar. Those items you just need for a couple of days away, are just great to have at your disposal. 
Most people that visit Girona once, never want to leave again. They want to come back, because Girona has it all. We recently opened a branch in Besalu which is small medieval copy of Girona. We have beaches, culture of Dali, the great Spanish kitchen with lotâs of different tapas and wines, old medieval villages and mountains great for skiing, hiking and cycling! What else do you want?

Thatâs why we fell in love with Girona and made it our business of helping people to find their dream holiday home for a weekâs stay or even to buy a property and have a second home in this amazing region! Sleep & Stay is owned by Jolien Huizing Gerrans, Dutch nationality, and she has surrounded herself by an amazing team. Sonia (Polish) and Luis (Honduras). We personally manage each holiday property that are featured on this website and are experts in the Girona property market for more than 4 years. We all speak next to our mother tongues Spanish, Catalan and English which makes all language barriers disappear!

As a young and dynamic holiday rental organisation, specialised in amazing holiday rentals, property management and property finder services. We can assist you in finding a special place to stay in Girona. We value quality, comfort and well maintained holiday rentals as our most important goals. We want to find that charming place for you that makes you fall in love with Girona too and makes you want to stay forever.

Once you arrive and you need anything, we are here to help you. Available on (Hidden by Airbnb) , email and we're just a phone call away. Welcome to come and stay with us!

host_about:
Real Estate Agency Pals and Begur
Sa Punta Costa Brava is a letting and estate agency helping tenants, landlords and buyer with properties since 1975. We arrange the selling, renting or management of apartments and houses on the Costa Brava, especially in the Playa de Pals and Begur.
Sa Punta Costa Brava is committed to delivering a high level of expertise, customer service, and attention to detail to holiday rentals and luxury properties sales and providing a professional service to clients and buyers alike. Also, we ensure high standard property maintenance in your absence.
Make your house or holiday apartment on the Costa Brava your home away from home.



Agencia Inmobiliaria en Pals y Begur
Sa Punta Costa Brava es una agencia inmobiliaria desde 1975 referente en la venta y alquiler de apartamentos y casas en la Costa Brava, especialmente, en la Playa de Pals y Begur.
Especializados en la venta y alquiler de casas y villas de lujo, Sa Punta Costa Brava es reconocida en el sector por su exclusivo servicio de atenciÃ³n personalizada. Ofrecemos un servicio a medida para cada cliente (conductores, baby-sitters, chefs, etc.) en nuestras propiedades en alquiler, asistencia jurÃ­dica y patrimonial en todo tipo de transacciones inmobiliarias o venta de propiedades y servicio de mantenimiento de las propiedades para los clientes que viven en el extranjero.
neighbourhood: Santa Maria de Solius, Catalunya, Spain

host_about:
There are two things that, above all else, define Bravissimo: our great attention for service and our love for Girona.
We search for the best apartments, in the best areas, to offer you accommodation in those places where anyone from Girona would want to live.
But in Bravissimo we strive to give you much more than just a place to sleep: we are in love with our beautiful city and we want to spread our passion for it.
Our aim is that all our guests leave wanting to return soon. That is why we take care of all the details so that your visit is an unforgettable experience.
We are a small family business and we want you to feel part of our family: we are near and at your disposal to solve any mishap that may arise and help you with anything that makes your stay easier, comfortable and pleasant.
In addition, you can count on us to recommend the best restaurants, beaches, visits, plans, cycling routes, etc.
We do not send our guests to the typical and overcrowded tourist places: we want you to know the real Girona and discover all its secrets.

We are looking forward to meet you!

name: Bonaire Hotel - quadruple room, L'Escala
description:
Located in the village of L'Escala, just 20 metres from the beach, the Hotel Bonaire is an establishment whose management was passed from parents to children until three years ago, which was transferred to other managers but now it is back to the Hotel Bonaire of before. A family hotel, managed by the same people who founded it. In its facilities it is possible to rest in an atmosphere where the family treatment and a great tranquility stand out.

The space
It is a centrally located hotel, which distributes its spaces in a classic and well-preserved construction, decorated with good taste and functionality. The hotel has an elevator and Wi-Fi.

The Hotel has 12 rooms decorated in a very cosy style. It has single, double, triple and quadruple alternatives, and all of them have a terrace, sea views and lateral views of the sea. They come equipped with a complete bathroom with hairdryer, television with access to cable channels, safe, air conditioning (hot
neighborhood_overview: Estartit is a small and charming town with a marina, diving center, surf, sailing schools and several playgrounds. The Medes Islands are located just over a kilometer from the coast of Estartit - this archipelago is one of the most important natural areas of the Mediterranean and it is a great reserve of marine fauna and flora. The stay in Estartit is a good base to explore Costa Brava: Dali Museum in Figueres is 40km away, Pitch and Putt Gualta - 18 holes is 10km away, the Greco-Roman ruins of EmpÃºries are 20km away.

host_about: HI , Let's introduce ourselves .. Alex (photo) and Pau Frigola , we are two cousins working alongside our local and international team plus our parents in an agency started by our grandparents in the early 60's.  One of the first in Calella de Palafrugell and with two other offices in Palafruguell and Tamariu.  We ve been coming to the office with our parents from day one .. we know the area like the back of our hand and we d be happy to assist you with your stay.  We are a family business and we have a large amount of properties to rent and sell on our books.  Our main office is on the beach in Calella de Palafrugell .  We speak various languages and are here to help you enjoy your stay in what we think is the best place in the World :))

neighborhood_overview:
Roses It is located on the north coast of the Gulf of Rosas, south of Cap de Creus. It is a great tourist center, with urbanizations, hotels and beaches and two ports (fishing and sports), and an attractive place of great importance within the northern sector of the Costa Brava. The coast of the municipality of Rosas includes a long sandy beach and further to the east a large number of coves, among which Canyelles Petites, L'Almadrava, Cabo Norfeu, Punta Falconera and Montjoi stand out.

The beach is situated very close to the apartment, just a 10 minute walk from the apartment.
Very close to the apartment and to the beach you will find many restaurants, beaches and activities to do. You will also have a supermarket very close to the apartment, just 5-10 minutes away walking distance.

name: Gloria Rooms 307
description:
Room located in the center of Roses, with capacity for 2 people. Very close, you will find all kinds of shops and restaurants where you can enjoy the best fish and fresh seafood from the Bay of Roses. Only 150 meters away is the sandy beach with one of the most crystalline waters of the coast of Girona and the promenade with wonderful views of the Bay of Roses. Ideal to enjoy with your family or your friends of the many possibilities offered by the Costa Brava.

IMPORTANT :

CHECK-IN ONLINE : some days before your arrival, you will receive, through Whatsapp, a link in order to check in online, register the occupants, pay the remaining,Â  sign the contract and you will receive also information about the keys collection.

When you check in online, you give an authorization to our agency in the case of misuse of the accommodation to collect the amount of the damage as a deposit. This amount is always done with a bill for the damage.

name: Gloria Rooms 106
description:
Room located in the center of Roses, with capacity for 2 people. Very close, you will find all kinds of shops and restaurants where you can enjoy the best fish and fresh seafood from the Bay of Roses. Only 150 meters away is the sandy beach with one of the most crystalline waters of the coast of Girona and the promenade with wonderful views of the Bay of Roses. Ideal to enjoy with your family or your friends of the many possibilities offered by the Costa Brava.

IMPORTANT :

CHECK-IN ONLINE : some days before your arrival, you will receive, through Whatsapp, a link in order to check in online, register the occupants, pay the remaining,Â  sign the contract and you will receive also information about the keys collection.

When you check in online, you give an authorization to our agency in the case of misuse of the accommodation to collect the amount of the damage as a deposit. This amount is always done with a bill for the damage.

name: Doble Con Terraza | Hotel Cluc
description:
All our Double Room with Terrace are spread over three unique floors, designed to create an intimate and cozy atmosphere. They have their own fully equipped bathroom, with hair dryer, heating and air conditioning with their own regulation. And a saying written on the walls that invites us to rest. You'll enjoy your time at this cheerful getaway.

The space
Located in the old quarter of the village, the building used to be called Can PallÃ­ and was refurbished in 2012 in line with its original architecture. Silent, well cared for and full of details, the Cluc is home to restored furniture, fabrics and textures, cement tile floors and emblematic communal areas.

Guest access
- Buffet
Start the day as you mean to go on with breakfast on our hotelâs small patio. We have national and international press for those wanting to know whatâs going on in the world.

- Wi-fi Service
All rooms have free, individual internet connection.
neighborhood_overview:
Begur was formerly a fishing village, a meeting point for coral workers, fishermen, returning emigrants from the Americas and cork workers. Its cobbled streets, the colonial houses of the locals who had returned from the Americas, the 16th Century defence towers and the Medieval Castle are icons of the village.

The local cuisine reflects its privileged location. You can find fresh local fish and seafood, seasonal and organic fruit and vegetables, top quality meatâ¦ Very different Mediterranean, modern, traditional and market cuisine styles. Festivities, fairs and traditions. Visits of cultural interest to sites, architectural remains and sea and mountain sporting activities, such as yachting, paddle boarding, snorkelling, kayaking, horse riding, golf, tennis and much more!
host_about: The Cluc is a charming little hotel, an old Indian house from the 1800's. The building, located in the old town, used to be called Can PallÃ­ and was rehabilitated in 2012 respecting its original architecture. Quiet, careful and full of details, in the Cluc you will find restored furniture, fabrics and textures, hydraulic floors and emblematic common spaces. In the library we have books in all languages for lovers of reading, in the living room, a Chester with magazines and two armchairs to chat, and outside, two terraces to enjoy the tranquility outdoors. When the weather permits, we serve breakfast outside. Sausages, sweets, cheeses and other products are zero kilometer; The pastries, yogurts, juices, smoothies, quince, creams and jams are natural, made by us. We do our best to offer a personalized and relaxed treatment, without dyes or preservatives, where we all feel calm and comfortable.

Fenals beach is the closest beach to Villa Carmen, it is approximately 2 km away and the center of Lloret is only 2.6 km from the villa.

The nearest supermarket is 1.6 km away, where you will find everything you need for your daily purchases.
host_about:
"Welcome to Hotel Port Salins,
In our hotel we want you to live a different experience, where all the staff will be aware, at every moment, of your well-being.
Simply, come and contemplate our range of comfortable and spacious rooms and suites, in order to disconnect, live, and experience an unforgettable vacation.
Relax and enjoy in our panoramic terrace with a Jacuzzi and views of the wonderful âBay of Rosesâ, named one of the most beautiful in the world by UNESCO. Meanwhile, you can enjoy the stunning sunsets offered by the Costa Brava whilst contemplating our barbecues or special events scheduled for such occasions.
Additionally, you will have the pleasure of bathing and relaxing in our spectacular swimming pool, located on the 'Salins' canal, surrounded by luxury yachts and a peaceful atmosphere.
We hope to become the perfect complement for your holidays."

The Silence Suite is inspired by the quiet and peaceful cobbled streets of the town. The vaulted ceiling, the light that enters the windows and the skylight, and the beige tones convey a profound feeling of tranquillity. name: Hotel Delamar 4****S - Only adults  (+ 18) -
description:
Hotel Delamar is designed for adults with a youthful personality who are searching for authenticity in a relaxing atmosphere during the day and a lively one at night, in true Costa Brava style.
Hotel Delamar is a fantastic mixture of Mediterranean and Cuban influences located in the heart of Lloret de Mar, in the shopping area and very close to the beach.
The hotel offers modern facilities, fine aesthetics and a varied gastronomic offer.

neighborhood_overview:
Blanes is certified with the family tourism destination brand, ideal for spending unforgettable holidays in a quiet environment. Its wide and long beach offers a wide variety of cafeterias, terraces and restaurants where you can taste the wide variety of Mediterranean food. It is the first town on the Costa Brava, which is why it is known as the "Portal of the Costa Brava", it is also a tourist municipality well known for its beautiful coves and beaches and surrounded by mountains. It has the first cove on the Costa Brava to the south: the cove of Sant Francesc, also called Cala Bona.
Also known for its festival and its international fireworks competition in Europe with more than 500,000 visitors from all over the world.
